appDesc.message: Improving everyone's favorite online download list, one loop at a time.

website.description: Website link text in the popup.

repo.description: Repository link text in the popup.

pageActionRun.description: Text for the page action's tooltip indicating to run (start/execute/launch) PSDLE.

psdleRunning.message:
PSDLE is already running on the current page!
It should be available in the bottom-left corner.

To stop using or restart PSDLE, please reload the page.
psdleRunning.description: Message to alert the user when they attempt to run PSDLE again. Provides the status, how to proceed, and other options.
